item.title: Morgan Stanley Beats Rivals With Heftiest Equity Underwriting Haul Since 2021
item.description: Whiplashing trade war updates held up some capital raising at the beginning of the second quarter, but a June comeback led to Morgan Stanley’s best global equity underwriting fee haul since the fourth

item.title: Dollar Hedging May Push Euro to $1.30, Morgan Stanley Says
item.description: The euro’s rally is about to get another boost, according to Morgan Stanley strategists, as European investors look to hedge nearly $4 trillion of US assets.

item.title: Dollar Hedging May Push Euro to $1.30, Morgan Stanley Says
item.description: The euro’s rally is about to get another boost, according to Morgan Stanley strategists, as European investors look to hedge nearly $4 trillion of US assets.

item.title: Morgan Stanley's Slimmon: Markets Too Optimistic on Rate Cuts
item.description: Andrew Slimmon, Morgan Stanley Investment Management senior portfolio manager, says the markets are bound for a correction but it won’t be because of tariffs. He speaks on “Bloomberg Open Interest.” (

item.title: Citadel Securities Big Move in Derivatives Dominance
item.description: Citadel Securities is buying Morgan Stanley’s unit focused on electronic market-making for US equity options. The move expands the firm’s already dominant role in the market. Bloomberg’s Sridhar Natar
